description: The Thornhide Calf is a young creature resembling a small, rugged bison, but with sharp thorns protruding from its hide. Its thick, natural armor serves as both a defense mechanism and a weapon against predators.

traits.name: Thorny Hide
traits.description: Any creature that makes a melee attack against the Thornhide Calf takes 1d4 piercing damage.

actions.name: Gore
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 2) piercing damage.
